channel.title: Comments on: Author Will Self argues the virtues of Nick Cave, the poet

item.title: By: jenny orchard
item.dc:creator: jenny orchard
item.description: I think Nick is the greatest songwriter of our time - in a world of banal lyrics and forgettable melodies he has the immense courage to express the sublime, the glorious as well as bottomless pits of sorrow, and the sheer absurdity of humankind. he does it so well. Truely wonderful, inspiring and endlessssly inventive -(not bad looking either!)
item.content:encoded:
I think Nick is the greatest songwriter of our time – in a world of banal lyrics and forgettable melodies he has the immense courage to express the sublime, the glorious as well as bottomless pits of sorrow, and the sheer absurdity of humankind. he does it so well.
Truely wonderful, inspiring and endlessssly inventive -(not bad looking either!)
